title: Yasuhiro Watanabe
text:
is a Japanese <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="Verspah%20Oita">Verspah Oita</a>.
Career.
Raised by his home-town team <a href="Albirex%20Niigata">Albirex Niigata</a>, Watanabe was promoted to the top team in 2011. He never played, but he was loaned twice, before to <a href="Tokushima%20Vortis">Tokushima Vortis</a> and then to <a href="Japan%20Soccer%20College">Japan Soccer College</a>. He was loaned again in August 2018 to <a href="Vonds%20Ichihara">Vonds Ichihara</a>.
Club statistics.
"Updated to 31 December 2020".
